website_summaries.verdict: A great option for a beginner-friendly airplane model kit, suitable for children and adults alike.
pros: Plastic parts simply snap together, avoiding the need for any glue or chemicals
The instructions are easy to follow for quick assembly
Comes with its own display stand
cons: Some of the plastic parts require extra work to snap together in the right configuration

customer_reviews.title: Accurate detail and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: For an initial entry into model collecting, this one was easy to assemble and detailed. Good value for collectors, especially for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Good quality MD-90 scale version
customer_reviews.text: Apart from the fact that it is made of plastic and very lightweight, it's a great looking and detailed aircraft model. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Mansoor Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Just one small problem
customer_reviews.text: Tail wing was slightly tilted to one side and if you have ocd about symmetrical objects then that would probably bother you a tiny bit
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Realize how small this plane actually is.
customer_reviews.text: Plane is extremely small compared to many planes on the market for only a few dollars more.Please look into this as I have bought many and was very surprised how actually small it was, even though measurements were provided in description.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Muilenburg

customer_reviews.title: Nice Plane!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9 year old son and he loves it playing with it. It doesn't have any landing gear, but he doesn't seem to mind.
customer_reviews.author: Remington

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very detailed. All the parts fit nicely. It looks great. Very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Brentt

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I love it... Very detailed... I work for Delta so I know what this plane looks like up and close..
customer_reviews.author: Felix Camacho Jr

customer_reviews.title: Nothing
customer_reviews.text: No what I wanted and also the delivery was very late
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Palacio

customer_reviews.title: Very nice model. Extremely easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very nice model. Extremely easy to assemble. Appears more expensive than it actually was.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very Authentic! It was smaller than I expected, but satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great little model of a great little plane
customer_reviews.text: Great little model of a great little plane. looks great and was a snap (lol) to put together. well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: matthew
